Detailed Description

Basic image processor for the ardrone.

Author
Arnaud Jacques & Alexandre Leclere
Date
2016

Part of ucl_basic_drone. Image processor ROS node for the ardrone. Contains:

  • SIFT (from non-free opencv library) to detect keypoints
  • Image transformations
  • Geometric transformations
  • Viewers

Definition in file basic_drone_imgproc.h.
